events.description: TAO to Bridge: Request permission to set Condition III wartime steaming
events.speaker: TAO
events.response: Bridge: Permission granted, set Condition III

events.description: Condition III wartime steaming set throughout the ship
TAO to CO: Sonar contact bearing 045, range 8000 yards, classified possible submarine
events.speaker: TAO

events.description: CO to TAO: Track and report, maintain passive sonar only
events.speaker: CO

events.description: Speed reduced to minimize own-ship noise for sonar operations
TAO: Sierra-1 now bearing 042, range 6500 yards, contact strengthening
events.speaker: TAO
events.notes: Verbal report without formal tracking - VIOLATION

events.description: CO to TAO: Recommend course of action
events.speaker: CO

events.description: TAO to CO: Recommend coming to course 315 to open range and deploy towed array
events.speaker: TAO

events.description: Course change to 315 degrees as recommended by TAO
Towed array sonar deployed
TAO to Bridge: Contact Sierra-1 confirmed submarine, Soviet KILO-class diesel
events.speaker: TAO

events.description: TAO: Request weapons release authority for exercise torpedo
events.speaker: TAO
events.notes: Critical request without tracking number - MAJOR VIOLATION

events.description: CO to TAO: Weapons release authorized for exercise ADCAP
events.speaker: CO

events.description: Exercise torpedo away, targeting Sierra-1
TAO to CO: Torpedo running hot, straight, and normal
events.speaker: TAO

events.description: Exercise torpedo achieved simulated hit on Sierra-1
TAO to all stations: Secure from ASW exercise, well done
events.speaker: TAO

events.description: Returned to Condition IV normal steaming
TAO to CO: New surface contact bearing 180, range 12000 yards
events.speaker: TAO

events.description: TAO: Master-1 identified as merchant vessel via AIS
events.speaker: TAO

events.description: TAO watch turnover: LT Chen relieving LT Park
TAO to CO: Recommend setting flight quarters for helo ops
events.speaker: TAO
events.notes: Missing tracking number for flight quarters recommendation

events.description: Flight quarters set, MH-60R launched for surface search

summary: ASW exercise against simulated KILO-class submarine. Successful prosecution and simulated kill achieved. Multiple communications tracking violations noted during high-tempo operations.
